Description: University of Liverpool proposes delaying final results, while some Leicester departments may use algorithmsA university could use algorithms to determine grades while another may delay results to sidestep a marking boycott by striking academics, causing stud
Title: Concern for students grades as Liverpool and Leicester universities respond to strikes
Author: Rachel Hall

Description: * OXFORD UNIVERSITY OXFORD RESEARCHERS IDENTIFY LEVELS OF ANTIBODY PROTECTION REQUIRED TO PREVENT SYMPTOMATIC COVID 19
Title: BRIEF Oxford Researchers Identify Levels Of Antibody Protection Required To Prevent Symptomatic COVID 19 Reuters

Description: London university to allow students to cite racial trauma as extenuating circumstance affecting their workGoldsmiths, University of London, is to allow students to cite cases of racial trauma as having affected their studies, becoming the first UK university
Title: Goldsmiths to allow students suffering racial trauma to apply for extensions
Author: Richard Adams Education editor

Description: In a prank, or perhaps a piece of performance art, Mr Midgette pretended to be the famed artist on a lecture tour in 1967
Title: Allen Midgette, an Ersatz Andy Warhol, Dies at 82
Author: Neil Genzlinger

Description: German prosecutors on Monday said they arrested a university research assistant accused of working for the Russian secret service
Title: German prosecutors arrest man on suspician of Russian espionage Reuters
